ComicInfo.Title: Crisis on Twin Earths!
ComicInfo.Summary: Crisis on Twin Earths!: Thor travels to Hyperion's world at the request of Hyperion, where Thor and the Squadron Supreme battle against the evil Hyperion and Emil Burbank.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:25. [Issue ID 33154]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

Burbank (movie director),Thor,Iron Man [Tony Stark],Squadron Supreme [Golden Arrow,Lady Lark,Captain America [Steve Rogers]] (cameo),Tom Thumb,Emil Burbank,Hyperion [Mark Milton],American Eagle],Hellcat,Doctor Spectrum,Loni Lattimer
ComicInfo.Writer: Don Thompson,Maggie Thompson,Roy Thomas,Don Thompson,Maggie Thompson,Roy Thomas
